title: Google Joins Singapore’s Green Fuel Tests Ahead of Flight Levy
title_zh: 谷歌在飞行征费前加入新加坡绿色燃料测试
summary: A total of nine firms plan to join the voluntary trial to purchase SAF through the Singapore Sustainable Aviation Fuel Company Ltd., or SAFCo, an entity being established under plans to begin charging a world-first green levy on departing flights from October.
summary_zh: 共有九家公司计划参加自愿试验，通过新加坡可持续航空燃料有限公司（SAFCo）购买 SAF。该实体是根据计划从 10 月开始对出发航班征收世界首个绿色税而成立的。

title: Oracle to Raise Up to $50 Billion in 2026 for Cloud Buildup
title_zh: Oracle 将于 2026 年筹集高达 500 亿美元用于云建设
summary: Oracle is raising money to build additional capacity to meet the contracted demand from the company’s largest cloud customers, including Advanced Micro Devices Inc., Meta Platforms Inc., Nvidia Corp., OpenAI, TikTok Inc. and xAI Corp., the company said in a statement Sunday.
summary_zh: 甲骨文周日在一份声明中表示，该公司正在筹集资金建设额外产能，以满足该公司最大云客户的合同需求，这些客户包括 Advanced Micro Devices Inc.、Meta Platforms Inc.、Nvidia Corp.、OpenAI、TikTok Inc.

title: Stock market today: Dow, S&P 500, Nasdaq futures plunge ahead of week defined by Trump's Fed pick, jobs data
title_zh: 今日股市：道琼斯指数、标准普尔 500 指数和纳斯达克期货在特朗普的美联储选择和就业数据的影响下暴跌
summary: Wall Street is in the throes of a contentious earnings season following a brutal week for commodities.
summary_zh: 在大宗商品经历了残酷的一周之后，华尔街正处于充满争议的财报季的阵痛之中。

title: Oracle says it plans to raise up to $50 billion in debt and equity this year
title_zh: 甲骨文表示，计划今年筹集高达 500 亿美元的债务和股本
summary: Oracle expects to raise $45 billion to $50 billion in 2026 to build additional capacity for ​its cloud infrastructure, the software company said on Sunday.
summary_zh: 该软件公司周日表示，预计到 2026 年将筹集 450 亿至 500 亿美元资金，为其云基础设施建设额外容量。

title: Could there be risks to allowing AI chip sales to China?
title_zh: 允许向中国销售人工智能芯片是否存在风险？
summary: Christopher Miller, professor at Tufts University's Fletcher School, weighs in on whether the decision to allow Nvidia (NVDA) to sale H200 chips to China may be ultimately problematic.Miller is also the author of "Chip War: The Fight for the World's Most Critical Technology."T...
summary_zh: 塔夫茨大学弗莱彻学院教授克里斯托弗·米勒 (Christopher Miller) 权衡了允许英伟达 (NVDA) 向中国出售 H200 芯片的决定是否最终会出现问题。米勒还是《芯片战争：争夺世界最关键技术》一书的作者。

title: 'The haves and the have nots': Wall Street sees divide in tech stock performance after earnings reports
title_zh: “富人和穷人”：财报发布后，华尔街认为科技股表现存在分歧
summary: A bifurcated picture of tech earnings is emerging during this season of quarterly reports.
summary_zh: 在本季度的季度报告中，科技公司的盈利情况出现了分歧。

title: How investors should look at the new Tesla as it leaves EVs behind
title_zh: 投资者应该如何看待新款特斯拉，因为它已经将电动汽车抛在了后面
summary: It's time to be real on Tesla.
summary_zh: 是时候真正对待特斯拉了。

title: January jobs data, Alphabet and Amazon earnings, more Warsh fallout: What to watch this week
title_zh: 1 月份就业数据、Alphabet 和亚马逊收益，以及沃什的更多影响：本周值得关注的内容
summary: Crucial labor market data, more earnings from Big Tech giants, and continued discussion over where Kevin Warsh may lead the central bank should set the agenda in the week ahead.
summary_zh: 重要的劳动力市场数据、大型科技巨头的更多收益，以及关于凯文·沃什可能领导央行的持续讨论，应该会在未来一周确定议程。

title: Minivan sales surge 21% in 2025 as millennial dads lead demand for cars offering the 'best bang for your buck'
title_zh: 千禧一代的爸爸们引领了对“物超所值”汽车的需求，2025 年小型货车销量将猛增 21%
summary: Most carmakers are only focused on the truck and SUV buyer, but one model saw a surge in popularity last year — the trusty family minivan.
summary_zh: 大多数汽车制造商只关注卡车和 SUV 买家，但去年有一款车型人气飙升——值得信赖的家庭小型货车。
